chunks.zh: 哪吒 2 要冲击中国影史票房？
chunks.en: Will Nezha 2 challenge the Chinese box office history?

chunks.zh:
总榜第一是长津湖 57.75 亿，猫眼今天预测哪吒 2 最终票房 67.40 亿。
去影院看了，有几个低级笑点，武力值不明确，谁谁都是五五开，但是特效炸裂，适合家带孩子看，不太适合单身人士。

https://i.v2ex.co/lo83Qj0xl.jpeg

https://i.v2ex.co/URS85lG0l.jpeg

https://i.v2ex.co/zntDrRgfl.jpeg
chunks.en:
The current top movie is The Battle at Lake Changjin with 5.775 billion. Maoyan predicts Nezha 2's final box office will be 6.74 billion today.
I watched it in the cinema. There are a few low-level jokes, the combat power is unclear, everyone is evenly matched, but the special effects are amazing. It is suitable for families with children, but not very suitable for single people.

chunks.zh: @wsseo #2 我们只是单身，不是没妈。
chunks.en: @wsseo #2 We are just single, not motherless.

chunks.zh: 上面的那个老哥，是不是又犯病了？人家标题讨论的是冲击影史票房，谈论的也是一部爆米花片，你进来来一句这类电影不好，你喜欢看什么，那你还发表评论干啥？非得要表现出大多数人没有审美水平，就你一个人有？每次逛 V 站都有这种人。还有为了冲击影史票房，老外玩的比我们溜得多，泰坦尼克号，阿凡达，还有当年的复联四都重映过。
chunks.en: Is that guy above having another episode? The topic is about challenging the box office history, and it's also discussing a popcorn movie. You come in and say this kind of movie is not good, what do you like to watch, then why do you even comment? Do you have to show that most people don't have aesthetic taste, and only you do? There are always people like this when browsing V2EX. Also, regarding challenging the box office history, foreigners are much better at it than us. Titanic, Avatar, and the Avengers 4 were all re-released.

chunks.zh: 榜单里的基本全是烂片
chunks.en: Most of the movies on the list are bad.

chunks.zh: @wsseo #2 建议最后半句删掉，这直接剧透完了……
chunks.en: @wsseo #2 I suggest deleting the last half of your sentence, it's a direct spoiler...

chunks.zh: 挺好的，票房这东西本来就是视觉奇观和工业大片撑起来的。之前国产影片靠剧情片喜剧片搞了几次以小博大，导致后面全都是这种片，但是这种片电影院和自己电视看起来差别不大，没必要花几倍的成本去看。这也是去年国内票房整体惨淡的重要原因。如果春节档哪吒获得高票房，哪怕是唐探或者封神也行。这样出品和投资方才能想明白这个问题，多拍适合在大荧幕上观看的影片，而不是去教育观众。
chunks.en: It's good. Box office revenue is supported by visual spectacles and industrial blockbusters. Previously, domestic films relied on drama and comedy films to achieve a few small wins, resulting in all films being of this type. However, there isn't much difference between watching these films in the cinema and on TV, so there is no need to spend several times the cost to see them. This is also an important reason for the overall dismal domestic box office last year. If Nezha can achieve high box office during the Spring Festival, even Detective Chinatown or Creation of the Gods would be good. This way, the producers and investors can understand this problem and make films that are suitable for viewing on the big screen, instead of trying to educate the audience.

chunks.zh: 作为爆米花电影,哪吒 2 还是很不错的,特效水平也是相当顶级的.剧情方面只能说一般般,不过爆米花电影要什么剧情,漫威迪士尼那些,也没什么剧情.
chunks.en: As a popcorn movie, Nezha 2 is still very good, and the special effects are top-notch. The plot is just average, but what plot does a popcorn movie need? Marvel and Disney ones don't have much plot either.

chunks.zh: 全是烂片...
chunks.en: All bad movies...

chunks.zh: 培养烂片市场
chunks.en: Cultivating a market for bad movies.

chunks.zh: 为什么不适合单身人士
chunks.en: Why is it not suitable for single people?

chunks.zh: @zle12688 因为单身人士就不适合看电影。而且里面有一些描写亲情的，哪吒的妈妈被念成丹了。
chunks.en: @zle12688 Because single people are not suitable for watching movies. And there are some depictions of family affection in it, and Nezha's mother is called 'Dan'.

chunks.zh: 我旁边的单身人士都看哭了，爆米花都没吃完。
chunks.en: The single person next to me cried, and didn't even finish the popcorn.

chunks.zh: 欧美爆米花到处加屎，现在有了国产爆米花这个新口味，没什么不好
chunks.en: Western popcorn movies add shit everywhere. Now that there is a new flavor of domestic popcorn, there is nothing wrong with it.

chunks.zh: 哪吒确实敢拍，哪有好坏，是非，神妖都一样，台上衣冠楚楚，台下男盗女娼
chunks.en: Nezha really dares to shoot, there is no good or bad, right or wrong, gods and demons are the same, dressed neatly on stage, but acting like thieves and prostitutes off stage.

chunks.zh: 挺不错的商业片，8-8.5 分没毛病
chunks.en: A pretty good commercial film, 8-8.5 points is fine.

chunks.zh: 全靠同行衬托😁
chunks.en: Entirely due to the contrast provided by peers.😁

chunks.zh: @chouxw112233 想了下说的不太对，“也”靠同行衬托
chunks.en: @chouxw112233 After thinking about it, what I said was not quite right, "also" relies on the contrast provided by peers.

chunks.zh: 昨天跟老婆孩子一起看了，不错的，9 分。
chunks.en: Watched it with my wife and kids yesterday, it was good, 9 points.

chunks.zh: 刚跟孩子一起看完，有一种当年看复联四的燃情，小孩子坐不住没想到全程安静看完，非常不错！
chunks.en: Just finished watching it with my child, it felt like watching Avengers 4 back then. I didn't expect the child, who usually can't sit still, to watch the whole thing quietly. Very good!

chunks.zh: 是同一导演吗？
chunks.en: Is it the same director?

chunks.zh: 不喜欢哪吒 1 ，对“我命由我不由天”嗤之以鼻。 哪吒 2 刚看完，觉得挺不错，格局大了，视觉效果还挺燃。我们已被消磨了意志，但是年轻人就应该这么燃，才有希望...
chunks.en: I didn't like Nezha 1 and sneered at "My fate is up to me, not the heavens." I just finished watching Nezha 2 and thought it was pretty good. The scope is bigger and the visual effects are quite exciting. Our will has been worn down, but young people should be so passionate to have hope...
